chapter.text: 36|1|Iyasina [1]
36|2|sapatha prajnamaya kura'anera
36|3|niscaya apani rasuladera antarbhukta
36|4|sarala pathera upara pratisthita.
36|5|E kura'ana prabala parakramasali, parama dayalu allahara kacha theke nayilakrta.
36|6|Yate apani satarka karate parena emana eka jatike yadera pitr purusaderake satarka kara haya ni, sutaram tara gaphila.
36|7|Abasya'i tadera adhikansera upara se bani abadharita hayeche [1]; kaje'i tara imana anabe na.
36|8|Niscaya amara tadera galaya cibuka paryanta beri pariyechi, phale tara urdhbamukhi haye geche.
36|9|Ara amara tadera samane pracira o pichane pracira sthapana karechi tarapara taderake abrta karechi; phale tara dekhate paya na [1].
36|10|Ara apani taderake satarka karuna ba na karuna, tadera pakse ubhaya'i samana; tara imana anabe na.
36|11|Apani sudhu taderake'i satarka karate parena ye'yikara' era anusarana kare [1] ebam gayebera sathe rahamanake bhaya kare. Ata'eba, take apani ksama o sam'manajanaka puraskarera susambada dina.
36|12|Niscaya amara mrtake jibita kari ebam likhe rakhi ya tara age pathaya o ya tara pichane rekhe yaya [1]. Ara amara pratyeka jinisa spasta kitabe sanraksita rekhechi [2].
36|13|Ara tadera kache barnana karuna eka janapadera adhibasira drstanta; yakhana tadera kache esechila rasulagana.

36|14|Yakhana amara tadera kache pathiyechilama dujana rasula, takhana tara tadera prati mithyaropa karechila, tarapara amara taderake saktisali karechilama trtiya ekajana dbara. Atahpara tara balechilena, 'niscaya amara tomadera kache prerita hayechi.
36|15|Tara balala, 'tomara to amadera mata'i manusa [1], rahamana to kichu'i nayila karenani. Tomara sudhu mithya'i balacha.
36|16|Tara balalena, 'amadera raba janena--- niscaya amara tomadera kache prerita hayechi.
36|17|Ara'spastabhabe pracara kara'i amadera dayitba.

36|18|Tara balala, 'amara to tomaderake amangalera karana mane kari [1], yadi tomara birata na ha'o tomaderake abasya'i patharera aghate hatya karaba ebam abasya'i sparsa karabe tomadera upara amadera paksa theke yantranadayaka sasti.
36|19|Tara balalena, tomadera amangala tomadera'i sathe [1]; eta ki ejan'ye ye, tomaderake upadesa de'oya hacche [2]? Baram tomara eka simalanghanakari sampradaya.
36|20|Ara nagarira pranta theke eka byakti chute asala, se balala, 'he amara sampradaya! Tomara rasuladera anusarana kara
36|21|anusarana kara tadera, yara tomadera kache kono pratidana caya na [1] yara satpathaprapta.
36|22|Ara amara ki yukti ache ye, yini amake srsti karechena ebam yamra kache tomaderake phiriye ne'oya habe, ami tara'ibadata karaba na
36|23|‘ami ki tamra paribarte an'ya ilah grahana karaba [1]? Rahamana amara kono ksati karate ca'ile tadera suparisa amara kono kaje asabe na ebam tara amake ud'dhara karate'o parabe na.
36|24|Erupa karale ami abasya'i spasta bibhrantite paraba.
36|25|Niscaya ami tomadera rabera upara imana enechi, ata'eba tomara amara katha sona.
36|26|Take bala hala, 'jannate prabesa kara [1].' Se bale uthala, 'haya! Amara sampradaya yadi janate parata
36|27|kirupe amara raba amake ksama karechena ebam amake sam'manita karechena.
36|28|Ara amara tara pare tara sampradayera birud'dhe asamana theke kono bahini patha'ini ebam pathanora'o chilama na [1].
36|29|Seta chila sudhumatra eka bikata sabda. Phale tara nithara nistabdha haye gela.
36|30|Paritapa bandadera jan'ya [1]; tadera kache yakhana'i kono rasula eseche takhana'i tara tara sathe thatta-bidrupa kareche [2].
36|31|Tara ki laksya kare na, amara tadera age bahu prajanmake dhbansa karechi [1]? Niscaya tara tadera madhye phire asabe na.
36|32|Ara niscaya tadera saba'ike ekatre amadera kache upasthita kara habe [1].
36|33|Ara tadera jan'ya ekati nidarsana mrta yamina, yake amara sanjibita kari ebam ta theke bera kari sasya, atahpara ta theke'i tara kheye thake.
36|34|Ara sekhane amara srsti kari khejura o angurera udyana ebam sekhane utsarita kari kichu prasrabana
36|35|yate tara khete pare tara phalamula hate athaca tadera hata eta srsta kareni. Tabu'o ki tara krtajnata prakasa karabe na
36|36|pabitra o mahana tini, yini srsti karechena sakala prakara srsti, yamina theke utpanna udbhida ebam tadera (manusadera) madhya theke'o (purusa o nari). Ara tara ya jane na ta theke'o [1].
36|37|Ara tadera jan'ya eka nidarsana rata, ta theke amara dina apasarita kari, takhana tara andhakaracchanna haye pare [1].
36|38|Ara surya bhramana kare tara nirdista gantabyera dike [1], eta parakramasali, sarbajnera nirdharana.
36|39|Ara camdera jan'ya nirdista karechi bibhinna man‌yila; abasese seta suska bamka, purono khejura sakhara akare phire yaya.
36|40|Suryera pakse sambhaba naya camdera nagala pa'oya ebam ratera pakse sambhaba naya dinake atikramakari ha'oya. Ara pratyeke nija nija kaksapathe samtara kate.
36|41|Ara tadera jan'ya nidarsana e'i ye, amara tadera bansadharaderake bojha'i nauyane aharana kariyechilama [1]
36|42|ebam tadera jan'ya anurupa yanabahana srsti karechi yate tara arohana kare [1].
36|43|Ara amara iccha karale taderake nimajjita karate pari; se abasthaya tadera kono ud'dharakari thakabe na ebam tara paritrana'o pabe na
36|44|amara paksa theke rahamata na hale ebam kichu kalera jan'ya jibanopabhoga karate na dile.
36|45|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, 'ya tomadera samane o tomadera pichane rayeche se byapare taka'oya abalambana kara [1]; yate tomadera upara rahamata kara haya
36|46|ara yakhana'i tadera rabera ayatasamuhera kono ayata tadera kache ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukha phiriye neya.

36|47|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, 'allah tomaderake ye riyika diyechena ta theke byaya kara' takhana kaphirara muminaderake bale, 'yake allah iccha karale kha'oyate paratena amara ki take kha'oyaba? Tomara to spasta bibhrantite rayecha.
36|48|Ara tara bale, 'tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala, e pratisruti kakhana purna habe
36|49|tara to apeksaya ache eka bikata sabdera, ya taderake aghata karabe tadera baka-bitandakale [1].
36|50|Takhana tara osiyata karate samartha habe na ebam nijedera paribara-parijanadera kache phire'o asate parabe na.
36|51|Ara yakhana singaya phumka deya habe takhana'i tara kabara theke chute asabe tadera rabera dike [1].
36|52|Tara balabe, 'haya! Durbhoga amadera! Ke amaderake amadera nidrasthala theke uthala? Dayamaya allah‌ to era'i pratisruti diyechilena ebam rasulagana satya'i balechilena.’
36|53|Eta habe sudhu eka bikata sabda; takhana'i edera sakalake upasthita kara habe amadera samane
36|54|atahpara aja karo prati kono yuluma kara habe na ebam tomara ya karate sudhu tara'i pratiphala deya habe.
36|55|E dina jannatabasigana anande magna thakabe
36|56|tara ebam tadera strigana susitala chayaya susajjita asane helana diye basabe.
36|57|Sekhane tadera jan'ya phalamula ebam tadera jan'ya banchita samasta kichu
36|58|parama dayalu rabera paksa theke salama, (sadara sambhasana ba nirapatta).
36|59|Ara'he aparadhira! Tomara aja prthaka haye ya'o [1].
36|60|He bani adama! Ami ki tomaderake nirdesa de'ini ye, tomara sayatanera ibadata karo na [1], karana se tomadera prakasya satru
36|61|ara amara'i ibadata kara, eta'i sarala patha.
36|62|Ara sayatana to tomadera bahu dalake bibhranta karechila, tabu'o ki tomara bujhani
36|63|eta'i se jahannama, yara pratisruti tomaderake de'oya hayechila.
36|64|Tomara ye kuphari karate se karane aja tomara ete dagdha ha'o [1].
36|65|Amara aja edera mukha mohara kare deba, edera hata katha balabe amadera sathe ebam edera pa saksya debe edera krtakarmera [1].
36|66|Ara amara icche karale abasya'i edera cokhaguloke lopa kare ditama, takhana era patha anbesane daurale [1] ki kare dekhate peta
36|67|ara amara icche karale sba sba sthane edera akrti paribartana kare ditama, phale era egiye'o yete parata na ebam phire'o asate parata na.
36|68|Ara amara yake dirgha jibana dana kari, srsti abayabe tara abanati ghataya. Tabu'o ki tara bujhe na [1]
36|69|Ara amara rasulake kabya racana karate sikha'ini ebam eta tamra pakse sobhaniya'o naya [1]. Eta to sudhu eka upadesa ebam suspasta kura'ana
36|70|yate ta satarka karate pare jibitake ebam yate kaphiradera birud'dhe sastira katha satya hate pare.
36|71|Ara tara ki laksya kare na ye, amadera hata ya tairi kareche ta theke tadera jan'ya amara srsti karechi gabadipasusamuha, atahpara tara'i egulora adhikari [1]
36|72|ara amara eguloke tadera basibhuta kare diyechi. Phale egulora kichu sankhyaka hayeche tadera bahana. Ara kichu sankhyaka theke tara kheye thake.
36|73|Ara tadera jan'ya egulote ache bahu upakarita ebam ache paniya upadana. Tabu'o ki tara krtajna habe na
36|74|ara tara allahara paribarte an'ya ilah grahana kareche e asaya ye, tara sahayyaprapta habe.
36|75|Kintu tara (e saba ilah) taderake sahayya karate saksama naya; ara tara tadera bahinirupe upasthitakrta habe [1].
36|76|Ata'eba tadera katha apanake yena duhkha na deya. Amara to jani ya tara gopana kare ebam ya tara byakta kare.
36|77|Manusa ki dekhe na ye, amara take srsti karechi sukrabindu theke? Athaca pare se haye pare prakasya bitandakari.
36|78|Ara se amadera sambandhe upama racana kare [1], athaca se nijera srstira katha bhule yaya [2]. Se bale, 'ke asthite prana sancara karabe yakhana ta pace gale yabe?’
36|79|Baluna, 'tate prana sancara karabena tini'i yini ta prathamabara srsti karechena [1] ebam tini pratyekati srsti sambandhe samyaka parijnata.
36|80|Tini tomadera jan'ya sabuja gacha theke aguna utpadana karena, phale tomara ta theke aguna prajbalita kara.
36|81|Yini asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena tini ki tadera anurupa srsti karate samartha nana? Hyam, niscaya. Ara tini mahasrasta, sarbajna.
36|82|Tamra byapara sudhu e'i ye, tini yakhana kono kichura icche karena, tini balena, 'ha'o', phale ta haye yaya.
36|83|Ata'eba, pabitra o mahana tini, yamra hate'i pratyeka bisayera sarbamaya kartrtba; ara tamra'i kache tomara pratyabartita habe [1].
